string.text: Find %s for Stepka
You need to bring tools to Stepka so he can upgrade the equipment.

You know, bro, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can fix both weapons and armor, and even do some upgrades! Well, I would if the tools were decent. But where can you get them around here? Maybe you can help me get a simple set?
I need a set of tools for rough work. It should include tools and oils for working with weapons. If you can get it, I'll be grateful, and maybe even pay you! .. Probably.
Great job, dude! Oh, sorry, I have nothing to pay you with. But I can give you a good discount!
Find %s for Styopka
We need to bring tools for delicate work to Styopka. He needs a more complete set to carry out more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey dude, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Will you help me out, buddy?
I need tools for delicate work. It should have everything I need. You'll be my brother if you get it for me!

Wow, thanks bro! Now I'll definitely get rich. Damn, I'll finally become successful!.. If, of course, I don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
Find %s for Styopka
We need to bring %s to Styopka. He needs a unique set to carry out even more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey kid, if you find something worthwhile, I'll give you a discount!
I need tools for calibration. It should have everything I need. You'll be my brother if you get them for me!

No way...! Thanks, bro! Now I'll definitely get rich. Damn, I'll finally become successful!.. If, of course, I don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, pal.
Find %s for Barkas
You need to bring tools to Barkas so that he can upgrade the equipment.

You know, bro, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can fix both weapons and armor, even do some upgrades! Well, I would if I had decent tools. But where can you get them here? Maybe you can help me get a simple set, huh?
I need a set of tools for rough work. It should contain tools and oils for working with weapons. If you can get it, I'll be grateful, I might even pay you!.. Probably.
Great, dude! Oh, sorry, I have nothing to pay you with. But I can give you a good discount!
Find %s for Barkas
Barkas needs tools for delicate work. He needs a more complete set to perform more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, dude, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Will you help me out, pal?
I need tools for delicate work. It should contain everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get it!

Oh, damn! Thank you, bro! Now I'll definitely get rich. Hell, I might even become successful!.. If, of course, I don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, pal.
Find %s for Barkas
Barkas needs %s. He needs a unique set of tools to perform even more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, guy, if you find something worthwhile, I'll give you a discount!
I need calibration tools. It should contain everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get them!

"No way...! Wow, thanks, buddy! Now I'll definitely become rich. Damn, I will finally become successful!... If, of course, I don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, friend."
%s for Antibiotic
You need to find a medical kit and bring it to Medic Antibiotic.
"I need a good set of medical tools. I can quickly patch up minor injuries, but for something more serious than a simple scalpel, I don't have what I need."
"I need a good set of medical tools. I can quickly patch up minor injuries, but for something more serious than a simple scalpel, I don't have what I need."
"Thank you, my friend! These tools will save many people's lives. Thanks again for the tools."
